urls.title: Curaçao: The Caribbean Vacation That Sets You Free
urls.description: Here in Curacao, you're free to explore every inch of our Caribbean paradise. Start planning your trip today, and Feel It For Yourself.

Caribbean Airlines joins Trinidad & Tobago in paying tribute and celebrating the 100th birthday of Mr. Aldwyn “Lord Kitchener” Roberts aka the Grand Master. We salute this national icon for his invaluable contribution to Calypso and culture 🎶🎤
#REcalibrated #iflycaribbean https://t.co/jvQyRKRKWk
